name: remake of colateralclem
short_description:
This will be an actual log of my future life...a journal or diary of my attempt to find a spot in the digital world. For sure I will call on my past life experiences and education.  But my focus will be on new skills and new challenges. 

Past Life:
1) Catholic belief system
2) Veteran US Navy
3) 46 Years Union Electrician
4) 42 Years married to Phyliss

Future Life:
1) Catholic belief system
2) Develop a respected presence in the art world of   
    the internet.
3) Photos,blogs, & hopefully comic books.
4) Stay married to Phyliss.
summary: c.c. is now leaving the 20th cent. and  entering the 21st.
